cast.name: 卡塔琳·真哲希 Katalin Gyöngyössy
卡罗伊·科瓦奇 Károly Kovács
安德拉斯·科扎克 András Kozák

introduction: There is a mystery. Man is born, and soon begins to make their future. Dream. Dream and Reality fatally divided. Why? The difficulty in answering this question in the film involves another mystery - the secret writing. Two types of creativity - zhiznetvorchestvo and art together in one character - a composer Vitaly Sokol.Portrait of a hero, his past and present, to complement the future, his vision of the future, abandoned children, which he would have lived. In Vitaly Sokolov detdomovskih kids, taking the first steps, a lot in common - children without parents. Therefore, he knows - that they were all waiting on the road to their dreams.
